Tool labelling Tool Image Round-Nose Chain-Nose Flat-Nose utters Hammer vs Mallet A mallet is made of one head, usually of wood or rubber They are used to hit softer A hammer is made generally of metal They are used to hit things like nails Flux Flux: “a compound, often made with borax, which is applied onto a joint before soldering to prevent oxides.

item.title: Aluminum Project
item.description: Artist Inspirations I had difficulty choosing what to create. I didn’t have any good ideas, and the ones I did have didn’t work out (see the rings on the right side of the sketch).

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Aluminum Project For this project, I had difficulty deciding on what I wanted to make. I found that multiple of my ideas were too difficult to implement, and as such I discarded said ideas.

item.title: Sweat Soldering Project
item.description: Inspirations I like their software, and their logo was very simple, conducive to sweat soldering. Artist Statement I Log Sketches glued to metals

item.title: Wire Project
item.description: Artist Statement I didn’t really have plans for this project. I thought of creating a bracelet out of 2 wires that switched sides (the first one), but the other two were ideas I had while working on the first.
